articles.description: Tether's circulating supply has slipped from about $83 billion a week ago to less than $76 billion on Tuesday.
articles.content:
Tether has faced repeated calls for a full audit of its reserves.
Investors have withdrawn more than $7 billion from tether since it briefly dropped from its dollar peg, raising fresh questions abou… [+5282 chars]
